item.description:
Meeting Format

1. Introductions: (15 mins)

2. Roundtable Discussion: (60 mins)


  • Individual Contributors: Why do they give and what are their expectations?
  • Building a donor campaign: What are the essential ingredients?
  • Donor relationships: Making and keeping friends!



4. Announcements, opportunities, connections (10 mins)

5.. Exchange business cards/social networking. (15 mins)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the room 15 minutes early. You'll recognize me from my photo!
item.name: Building and Managing a Successful Donor Development Campaign
